name: Haunted Hearts
description:
Short game. Made in 3 weeks for school project.

Idea of game is to make people(and Cats) aware of you till you can give them a gift and become friends.

But beware people are fickle and some are more scared than others.

collect enough friends to get happy ending.... good luck

Special thanks to Seppo Toikka (unity teacher) ,Kosti Timonen (sounds) and Konsta (3d Models).
